page.title: 07Peak Dale Church Centenary
page.content: and invite some of the people who have been married in the church, and who are still together.There have been 300 weddings in the church and over 80 christenings. The church has just been redecorated for the celebrations.Money for this and other expenses (such as insurance,lighting and heating) has been raised at events organised by people like Mrs Potts.Mrs Potts is the secretary and has been with the church for 40 years.She organises an annual sale and a Harvest Supper. The present vicar is Rev Burnett.He works at four churches (one each in Peak Dale,Wormhill,Dove Holes and Peak Forest).Rev Burnett enjoys his work.He and his wife live in the vicarage in Dove Holes. Lisa Salt
